catalog.description: This class focuses on specialty techniques of SCUBA diving for divers who are already open water certified. The class is taught by Dive Utah (diveutah@diveutah.com).
catalog.note: Taught off campus. Fee. Course information and outline are found at https://studentwellness.byu.edu/swell-classes. Be aware that BYU only proctors the course, and cannot answer specific questions. Contact Dive Utah at 801-277-3483 with questions.
catalog.title: Intermediate Scuba Diving.

course_headers.header_text: FEE. Please be aware that BYU only proctors the course, and cannot answer any specific questions regarding the course. You will need to contact Dive Utah 801-277-3483 for any/all questions regarding the course. • Taught off campus. Fee. Course information and outline are found at http://studentwellness.byu.edu/physical/activitycourses.
